decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [Unnumbered location plan, 000 00, 001 00, 002 00, 003 00, 004 00, 005 00, , Fire safety strategy, Flood risk assessment, Planning Statement, Construction Method Statement Received 04/09/2024
P01 01, P02 01, P03 01, P04 01, P05 01, P10 01 received 25/10/2024].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.

Condition : 4 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public. 
Reason: In order to protect the living conditions of neighbouring residents.

Condition : 5 - The basement hereby permitted shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.
Reason: In order to ensure that adequate living standards are maintained and to protect neighbours' living conditions.
description: Proposed enlargement of existing cellar to a single storey basement and excavation of a covered front lightwell.
